title: What are the great areas of study and research today? - Quora

response.answer_text: The area in which you will start studying and researching will become the great area of research. For research purposes sky is the limit. There are plethora of material available in every subject in which you can float for lifetime and still that time will not be enough for you to cover that subject. So choosing the subject of your interest will be the best option available to you. Choose wisely! :)

Research can be done in any field. What matter is how you look at things. You should know about field you are researching. You could do research in any field. Like biological, chemical , computational, mathematical,etc . Just find right place to fit in and there, you ho. Simple ,as question.
